commit.message:
feat(pd): historical validation, new choices;

- Added 2025-2026 fiscal quarters to the choices.
- Changed TravelQ validation to be behind a historical date of April 1st.
- Changed HospitalityQ validation to be behind a historical date of April 1st.
- Added more pytest coverage.

feat(misc): changelog;

- Added change log files.

fix(pd): excel required;

- Fixed syntax in required excel formulae.

fix(pd): hospitalityq attendees;

- Put attendee field validation behind April 1st 2025 gate.

fix(templates): user activity;

- Fix old broken code.

feat(misc): changelog;

- Added change log file.

Merge pull request #1573 from open-data/fix/pd-historical-validation

Historic Valication for HospitalityQ & TravelQ (plus 2025-2026 fiscal quarter choices)

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Update ministers list for March 14, 2025.

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Moved the validation for TravelQ `destination_` and `disclosure_group` fields to be on or after April 1st 2025.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Moved the validation for HospitalityQ `disclosure_group` and `_attendee` fields to be on or after April 1st 2025.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Added 2025-2026 fiscal quarters to the valid choices for Proactive Disclosure schemas.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Fixed an issue with the User Activity template. Sysadmins can now easily navigate to a User's activity page.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+The `place_of_publication` and `geographic_region` fields now render as Select2 fields.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Updated the page title, stage/phase labels, and stage/phase buttons on the Dataset form pages.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+Improved the display of Resource Validation and XLoader badges to be more clear. Errors/failures will now display in semantic alert areas with a button link to go to the respective report. Successful and Processing badges will display as normal. The Frictionless report items will now be expanded by default, showing the user how to correct the problems in their data.
\ No newline at end of file

     - recombinant_webform.js
   output: canada_internal/%(version)s_recombinant_webform.js
+
+frictionless:
+  contents:
+    - registry_frictionless.js
+  output: canada_internal/%(version)s_registry_frictionless.js
\ No newline at end of file

+        """
+        record = get_chromo('hospitalityq')['examples']['record']
+

+

+

+        record['end_date'] = '2024-01-15'

+            self.lc.action.datastore_upsert(

+

+    def test_attendees(self):
+        """
+        Attendee fields cannot be zero or below if on or after April 1st 2025
+        """
+        record = get_chromo('hospitalityq')['examples']['record']
+
+        record['start_date'] = '2025-04-29'
+        record['end_date'] = '2025-04-30'
+        record['employee_attendees'] = -2
+        record['guest_attendees'] = -5
+        record['employee_attendees'] = 0
+
+        with pytest.raises(ValidationError) as ve:
+            self.lc.action.datastore_upsert(
+                resource_id=self.resource_id,
+                records=[record])

+            assert 'employee_attendees' in err
+
+        record['start_date'] = '2024-04-29'
+        record['end_date'] = '2024-04-30'
+
+        self.lc.action.datastore_upsert(
+                resource_id=self.resource_id,
+                records=[record])
+

commit.message: Add new command compare_orgs_ckan_json for manaaging the CKAN organization field
Add new command compare_orgs_ckan_json for manaaging the CKAN organization field
OPEN-3978: Pagination button link fixes
OPEN-3881: No longer accept invalid fields in the URL request
Quick fix for GA
Add a log message for bad queries
OPEN-3998: Do a basic reset of the search. This simple approach provided better result than more complicated code
Fix issue with search_format parameter

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+The Search app will no longer accept invalid fields in the URL request. If an invalid field is found, the search app will 
+return a 400 code and display an error message.
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+The pagination links at the bottom of the Search page can contain the wrong sort order when the application
+automatically switches the sort type because the user has entered search text for the first time in the 
+session. A different, non-JavaScript approach resolves this issue.
\ No newline at end of file
